  • 41a4f46 Fri May 19 10:25:52 2017 +0200 Tom Reijnders
    Change to exported packages (mainly for blackboard)

    - Blackboard soesn't like the ?version=... parameter we put after .js
    files and css files
    - They're intended to fool the cache in the case of a new update
    - They're not that important for exported packages
    - So rather than adding a Blacboard flag I removed all version parameters
    from all exported packages

  • 8d7a1df Fri May 12 09:39:17 2017 +0100 FayCross
    Improved the way responsiveness and theme stylesheets are set up

    The default responsive.css file is now used in every project so theme responsive.css files now need only contain css that's different to default (previously every theme had a duplicate of the default.css file in it)

    Added a number of new classes to x_mainHolder div so that css in model pages & css uploaded to LOs can now easily target specific pages & circumstances. The classes are x_mobile x_desktop x_touchScreen x_responsive & x_pageName_page (where pageName is the model file name).

    Accessibility improvements to navigator pages:
    - Removed unnecessary tabindexes
    - Changed order of some elements so screen reader reading order is more logical
    - Made keyboard controls more consistent (e.g. can tab to everything - don't have to swap between tab & arrows to access other tabs)

    - Fixed bug where screen readers couldn't access panel contents on tabNav page

  • 8e33412 Sat Jan 30 20:14:19 2016 +0100 Tom Reijnders
    Improve compatibillity with IE: force IE compatibillity mode off

    1. Make sure all html documents start with this on the FIRST line:

    <!DOCTYPE html>

    2. Make sure these are the FIRST 3 meta tags in the header:
    <head>
    <meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">

  • 6bb0cce Tue Nov 24 17:35:58 2015 +0100 Tom Reijnders
    jQuery.text needs to called from a selector

    - stripped = $("demo/test1").text() results in an error as demo/test1 is seen as an
    expression.
    First put it in an html block:
    var div = $("<div>").html("demo/test1");
    stripped = div.text();

    See #387

    Better fix for spaces in file names (media and quota, export)

    like ñ, é, etc
    - And of course the encoding is different for images/media placed in the
    editor, or placed through the media option in the wizard
    - Solution is to decode the xml string (which results in invalid xml, but
    works for this purpose.

  • e8e948f Tue Jul 21 15:01:46 2015 +0100 Ron Mitchell
    Fix for issue #351. Have changed code so that it only changes value of extra_flags for projects where that value is empty. So it doesn't change where engine is already set to flash or javascript and only changes to javascript where value is currently empty. As this is now xerte 3 I think setting the empty values to javascript should be ok but we can change the value set to Flash if we think that should be the case. The main point is that running upgrade.php doesn't now change all projects to flash.
  • b7369a2 Tue Jul 21 15:01:46 2015 +0100 Ron Mitchell
    Fix for issue #351. Have changed code so that it only changes value of extra_flags for projects where that value is empty. So it doesn't change where engine is already set to flash or javascript and only changes to javascript where value is currently empty. As this is now xerte 3 I think setting the empty values to javascript should be ok but we can change the value set to Flash if we think that should be the case. The main point is that running upgrade.php doesn't now change all projects to flash.

  • 3294771 Mon Nov 3 11:26:57 2014 -0500 Brad Smith
    Fix for #82: undefined database_type

    The database.php template does not set database_type, which is needed
    during installation.

    Additionally, since all of the database_* values are set as properties
    of $xerte_toolkits_site at the top of the file, I updated the code
    further down to use those values instead of pulling from _POST/_SESSION,
    etc again.
  • bea55b6 Mon Nov 3 11:26:57 2014 -0500 Brad Smith

    The database.php template does not set database_type, which is needed
    during installation.

    Additionally, since all of the database_* values are set as properties
    of $xerte_toolkits_site at the top of the file, I updated the code
    further down to use those values instead of pulling from _POST/_SESSION,
    etc again.
  • 5b0ddb3 Mon Nov 3 11:24:17 2014 -0500 Brad Smith
    fix for #82: missing ldap_knownname

    ldap_knownname has no default value in the db schema, but wasn't being
    set, resulting in an error. Following the behavior of upgrade.php, I've
    set this to the same value as ldap_host. However, I can't find any
    evidence of ldap_knownname actually being used anywhere, so is it even
    needed?
  • 6eca10d Mon Nov 3 11:24:17 2014 -0500 Brad Smith

  • 1941873 Wed Jul 2 13:37:56 2014 +0100 John Smith
    Hide the header logo in site template as logo doesn't exist - issue #63
    For installs where logo has been placed at 'modules/site/parent_templates/site/common/img/logo.png' you can add

    <style type="text/css">
    #overview div.logo {
    display: inherit;
    }
    </style>

    And that will again show the div
  • 6363ce9 Wed Jul 2 13:37:56 2014 +0100 John Smith
    Hide the header logo in site template as logo doesn't exist - issue #63
    For installs where logo has been placed at 'modules/site/parent_templates/site/common/img/logo.png' you can add

    <style type="text/css">
    #overview div.logo {
    display: inherit;
    }
    </style>

    And that will again show the div

  • d456e1c Thu Jul 25 13:19:39 2013 +0000 John Smith
    OPTIMISATION - changed the routine that replaces non-CDATA wrapped, in-parameter line breaks to prevent XML stripping them.

    Shorter code and faster - uses split/replace/join rather than previous method of string mapping/parsing.

    Saving 50-100 milliseconds on a bloated 560 test object...

    git-svn-id: https://xerteonlinetoolkits.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@1062 912cdd6b-5c7d-d5a7-a2ba-d0f0cdb91641

  • 75f6a77 Wed Jul 24 09:07:55 2013 +0000 John Smith
    OPTIMISATION: Changed a few things to make xenith faster and more consistent:

    Changed all new Object() references to { }
    Changed all for (i=0; i<xxx.length; i++) to (i=0, len=xxx.length; i<len; i++) - some loops are nested so shaves 10s/100s milliseconds on 560 or similarly large LOs, depending on features (pagelinks, glossary, etc) in use...

    Please keep out of v2 just now for further testing...

    git-svn-id: https://xerteonlinetoolkits.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@1060 912cdd6b-5c7d-d5a7-a2ba-d0f0cdb91641

    Changed all for (i=0; i<xxx.length; i++) to (i=0, len=xxx.length; i<len; i++) - some loops are nested so shaves 10s/100s milliseconds on 560 or similarly large LOs, depending on features (pagelinks, glossary, etc) in use...

    Please keep out of v2 just now for further testing...

    HTML5
    xenith.js:
    - bug fix where narration bar width wasn't always updating on change of LO size,
    - bug fix where if page was skipped quickly past it wouldn't always show correctly when returned to,
    - changed order things are done in when page changed to fix some css problems (e.g. not calculating available size correctly if narration bar is visible)
    - tidied up code,
    - removed unneccessary x_sortInitObject function

    textSWF/xerteModel.htm:
    - removed call to unneccessary x_sortInitObject function

    connectorHotspotImage.htm:
    - bug fix where audio continued to play when dialog closed

    flickr.htm:
    - bug fix where panel jumped to left after image loaded in Chrome

    Other page models:
    - changed calls to sizeChanged() from init() to fit in with changes made in xenith.js
    - changed the way image load events are used as they sometimes missed cached images being reloaded

    git-svn-id: https://xerteonlinetoolkits.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@885 912cdd6b-5c7d-d5a7-a2ba-d0f0cdb91641
  • 4560fb5 Fri May 10 12:21:27 2013 +0000 Fay Cross
    HTML5
    xenith.js:
    - bug fix where narration bar width wasn't always updating on change of LO size,
    - bug fix where if page was skipped quickly past it wouldn't always show correctly when returned to,
    - changed order things are done in when page changed to fix some css problems (e.g. not calculating available size correctly if narration bar is visible)
    - tidied up code,
    - removed unneccessary x_sortInitObject function

    textSWF/xerteModel.htm:
    - removed call to unneccessary x_sortInitObject function

    - bug fix where audio continued to play when dialog closed

    flickr.htm:
    - bug fix where panel jumped to left after image loaded in Chrome

    Other page models:
    - changed calls to sizeChanged() from init() to fit in with changes made in xenith.js
    - changed the way image load events are used as they sometimes missed cached images being reloaded

  • 2c5834e Mon Mar 4 20:49:25 2013 +0000 Tom Reijnders
    Added function get_email_headers() to functions.php (don't know whether that's the best location), that tries to build a proper header stringe for the php mail function:
    1. It adds the site_email_account as the From: header, if there is no From field in the site_details->headers field
    2. It adds a Content-Type header is it is not in the site_details->headers field
    3. It replaces the '*' with '\n' in the site_details->headers field and adds the result.
    Added retouremail to the peerreview form. I decided NOT to change the Database schema, but encoded the retouremail address(es) in the additional_sharing->extra field.

    git-svn-id: https://xerteonlinetoolkits.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@710 912cdd6b-5c7d-d5a7-a2ba-d0f0cdb91641
  • f0ba262 Mon Mar 4 20:49:25 2013 +0000 Tom Reijnders
    Added function get_email_headers() to functions.php (don't know whether that's the best location), that tries to build a proper header stringe for the php mail function:
    1. It adds the site_email_account as the From: header, if there is no From field in the site_details->headers field
    2. It adds a Content-Type header is it is not in the site_details->headers field
    3. It replaces the '*' with '\n' in the site_details->headers field and adds the result.
    Added retouremail to the peerreview form. I decided NOT to change the Database schema, but encoded the retouremail address(es) in the additional_sharing->extra field.

    git-svn-id: https://xerteonlinetoolkits.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@710 912cdd6b-5c7d-d5a7-a2ba-d0f0cdb91641
  • 8cfccee Mon Mar 4 15:57:34 2013 +0000 John Smith
    PLUGINS, ACTIONS & FILTERS: This code allows you to add a 'plugin' in the /plugins folder which will augment functionality provided by XOT. It allows you to create single file or folder style plugins (similar to Wordpress) which add functionality to various 'hook' points within the page. These hooks are by no means definitive and hopefully we can add lots more, however for filters to work in a better way some code will need re-written in order to pass 'content' through the filter before being used or echo-ed..

    The current files should do nothing to an install. The example plugins are commented out - remove the 'REMOVE_THIS' text from the filenames in order to activate. The 'GCU Plugin' demonstrates some potentially useful functionality:

    It adds a banner at the top of the page (login and editor)
    It changes the <title> text
    It changes the "My Projects" text to "John's Projects"
    It adds text to Pod 1
    It adds a title slide to data.xml on save

    The plugin_one plugin simply inserts HTML comments at action hook points throughout the page. Enable this by taking out REMOVE_THIS and then refresh the page and view the source to reveal it's result...

    git-svn-id: https://xerteonlinetoolkits.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@709 912cdd6b-5c7d-d5a7-a2ba-d0f0cdb91641
  • 92dad5d Mon Mar 4 15:57:34 2013 +0000 John Smith
    PLUGINS, ACTIONS & FILTERS: This code allows you to add a 'plugin' in the /plugins folder which will augment functionality provided by XOT. It allows you to create single file or folder style plugins (similar to Wordpress) which add functionality to various 'hook' points within the page. These hooks are by no means definitive and hopefully we can add lots more, however for filters to work in a better way some code will need re-written in order to pass 'content' through the filter before being used or echo-ed..

    The current files should do nothing to an install. The example plugins are commented out - remove the 'REMOVE_THIS' text from the filenames in order to activate. The 'GCU Plugin' demonstrates some potentially useful functionality:

    It adds a banner at the top of the page (login and editor)
    It changes the <title> text
    It changes the "My Projects" text to "John's Projects"
    It adds text to Pod 1
    It adds a title slide to data.xml on save

    The plugin_one plugin simply inserts HTML comments at action hook points throughout the page. Enable this by taking out REMOVE_THIS and then refresh the page and view the source to reveal it's result...

    remove pointless validation code from js - this does not protect from sql injection

    git-svn-id: https://xerteonlinetoolkits.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@643 912cdd6b-5c7d-d5a7-a2ba-d0f0cdb91641
  • d0b6579 Fri Jan 25 15:20:06 2013 +0000 Tom Reijnders
    1. Added an optional parameter visuals (Flash Engine Visuals) for the learningObject in data.xwd. This is exactly the same as the visuals of IFC (in standalone Xerte). It enables to have a white default player without the accessibility buttons. I still need to implement a way to get those back by a key press. It makes the LO easier for children with ADD or ADHD. The visuals of the learningObject has priority over the visuals of IFC. It doesn't have any effect on the HTML5 code.

    2. Added a parameter language (Language) to the learningObject in data.xwd. The parameter itself was already in, but you could not edit it.

    3. Changed code, so that the language parameter of learningObject has precedence over the language of LO. This is a change that should be checked in HTML5.

    4. Modified the language selection code of XOT (it now uses the language-config.xml file to present the available options, and it is available in the workspace, so now you can change languages even if you use some kind of integration or guest access. (It used to available on the login page only)

    5. Added a 'LanguageList'type in the wizard. It presents a combobox populated with the languages in language-config.xml. This is used in 2.

    6. Changed the wizard so that the popup messages can be translated as well.

    git-svn-id: https://xerteonlinetoolkits.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@642 912cdd6b-5c7d-d5a7-a2ba-d0f0cdb91641
  • 6f667cb Fri Jan 25 15:20:06 2013 +0000 Tom Reijnders
    1. Added an optional parameter visuals (Flash Engine Visuals) for the learningObject in data.xwd. This is exactly the same as the visuals of IFC (in standalone Xerte). It enables to have a white default player without the accessibility buttons. I still need to implement a way to get those back by a key press. It makes the LO easier for children with ADD or ADHD. The visuals of the learningObject has priority over the visuals of IFC. It doesn't have any effect on the HTML5 code.

    2. Added a parameter language (Language) to the learningObject in data.xwd. The parameter itself was already in, but you could not edit it.

    3. Changed code, so that the language parameter of learningObject has precedence over the language of LO. This is a change that should be checked in HTML5.

    4. Modified the language selection code of XOT (it now uses the language-config.xml file to present the available options, and it is available in the workspace, so now you can change languages even if you use some kind of integration or guest access. (It used to available on the login page only)

    5. Added a 'LanguageList'type in the wizard. It presents a combobox populated with the languages in language-config.xml. This is used in 2.

    6. Changed the wizard so that the popup messages can be translated as well.

    git-svn-id: https://xerteonlinetoolkits.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@642 912cdd6b-5c7d-d5a7-a2ba-d0f0cdb91641
  • 6ff7767 Fri Jan 25 14:45:57 2013 +0000 Fay Cross

    git-svn-id: https://xerteonlinetoolkits.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@641 912cdd6b-5c7d-d5a7-a2ba-d0f0cdb91641

  • 181c2dd Mon Nov 26 20:16:03 2012 +0000 ronm123
    extracted the commented authentication options from config.php and added to a required file named auth_config.php. This means when updating/upgrading config.php can be overwritten without changing the authentication method back to Guest. When updating/upgrading auth_config.php should be excluded or re-edited after update. Updated the moodle_integration_readme.txt instructions to reflect this change.

    git-svn-id: https://xerteonlinetoolkits.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@553 912cdd6b-5c7d-d5a7-a2ba-d0f0cdb91641

    Added support for historic navigation and all pages being able to set which navigation buttons are displayed. Updated versions of connectorHotspotImage and connectorMenu which use pageList and linkID. Removed plain text connector, tabbed nav connector and redirector connector as these are now obsolete given the new ability to add pageLinks to text.

  • d43437b Fri Nov 9 15:16:42 2012 +0000 John Smith
    x_pageInfo now also holds any linkID and pageIDs

    Also added 3 functions to help with page linking:

    x_addPageLinks - processes the asfunction links to add page link functionality
    x_navigateToPage - go to either page number, linkID or pageID
    x_lookupPage - finds pageID or linkID in the pageInfo array and returns page number

    git-svn-id: https://xerteonlinetoolkits.googlecode.com/svn/trunk@472 912cdd6b-5c7d-d5a7-a2ba-d0f0cdb91641

    Fixes and additions for export
    - Should copy all the language .xml files from the top of the /language folder
    - Should enable scorm2004 compliant export
    - Should copy JMolViewer and/or mapstraction folders if and only if those models are used
    - Should ONLY export the used media, the rest is not copied
    - small fixes in htaccess.conf
    - small fixes in library/Xerte/Authentication/Db.php
    - get rid of superfuous scorm files
    - move MainPreloader.swf, rloObject.js and resources.swf out of scorm in in their own folder (modules/xerte/export)
